Articles.Content:
I'm looking for an excessively cluttered 1.8.1 savefile with only a few mods (or less).

Why, you ask? Because I found a very, very old challenge where you launch some kerbals into orbit of Kerbin, and use KAS and KIS to build rockets (salvaged from debris scattered around the system) to get them everywhere else. It's a cool challenge which I really want to try, but to do this, you need a very cluttered savegame. I have no good savegames for this. This is where you come in: hand me a Dropbox/Google Drive download link for a save game, and I'll see where I can put my kerbals. (I'm planning on Jeb, Bill, Bob, and Val, so it'd be nice if they weren't in space, but if not, that's okay).

Part Mods I'm Game With:

Spoiler

 

kOS

Tweakscale

KIS/KAS

Both DLC (not really mods but oh well)

 

Anything else will bork my KSP because I won't have those mods (the modlist i currently have is the current modlist for a career which I'm not in the mood for memorizing the modlist of).

Oh yeah, one last thing: please, please make it 1.8.1, or else all of my current mods won't work.

Thank you for your time, and sorry for the odd restrictions.

Edited December 30, 2019 by LittleBitMore

Yeah sure, just drop it in the save file folder. It's just a sandbox save where I try to use as little advanced tech as possible.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/jws4xvgzur8xicx/AAD4imI4bYbNT1NFJKWgU6qUa?dl=0
I have one filled with over 112 pcs of debris but it has a ton of mods is that okay?
